Interface ChainableJdbcAction<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the action's return type
All Superinterfaces:
JdbcAction<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseChainableJdbcAction
public interface ChainableJdbcAction<T>
extends JdbcAction<T>

Augments a JdbcAction with chaining capabilities

Author:
Jawher

Method Summary
 ChainableJdbcAction<T> then(JdbcAction<?> action)
          returns a new ChainableJdbcAction (so that it can be chained with other actions) that executes the current action then the argument action and returns this action's result
<S> ChainableJdbcAction<S>
thenReturn(JdbcAction<S> action)
          returns a new ChainableJdbcAction (so that it can be chained with other actions) that executes the current action then the argument action and returns the argument action's result
 
Methods inherited from interface org.nothing.JdbcAction
doWithConnection
 

Method Detail

then

ChainableJdbcAction<T> then(JdbcAction<?> action)
returns a new ChainableJdbcAction (so that it can be chained with other actions) that executes the current action then the argument action and returns this action's result

Parameters:
action - a JdbcAction to chain with this action
Returns:

thenReturn

<S> ChainableJdbcAction<S> thenReturn(JdbcAction<S> action)
returns a new ChainableJdbcAction (so that it can be chained with other actions) that executes the current action then the argument action and returns the argument action's result

Type Parameters:
S - the argument's action and the resulting action's return type
Parameters:
action - a JdbcAction to chain with this action
Returns:
